name: VIDEO: Public Health Workers Make Hepatitis A Vaccines Easy to Access
description: County health officials are keeping a close watch over a slight uptick of hepatitis A infection cases among people experiencing homelessness.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: County health officials are keeping a close watch over a slight uptick of hepatitis A infection cases among people experiencing homelessness. Vaccination offers the best protection from this contagious virus, so public health teams are out and about making access to the vaccine as convenient as possible.
